definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: He became provost in 2006 and president the following year.
sentences.chinese: 他从2006年起担任教务长并于次年成为校长。

sentences.english: And the test arrangement is the important constituent part of the educational administration management.
sentences.chinese: 而考场安排管理系统是教务管理系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: See my mother beg and cry to the administrators at my little brother's school.
sentences.chinese: 看见我妈在我弟学校哭着求教务主任。

sentences.english: The headmaster appointed a dean to take charge of student affairs.
sentences.chinese: 校长任命了一名教务主任来负责学生事务。

sentences.english: Design of security solution for Web-based educational administration system;
sentences.chinese: 系统分析了高校教务管理系统安全问题的现状。

sentences.english: It can provide the course arrangement system and teaching administration system with basic data.
sentences.chinese: 为排课系统和教务管理系统提供基本的数据流等。

sentences.english: Academic Administration and other job I think I can study hard.
sentences.chinese: 教务行政等一些工作我想我也可以努力学习。

sentences.english: This is Dean's Office of Ningbo Xiaoshi Middle School.
sentences.chinese: 这是宁波效实中学教务主任办公室。

sentences.english: Congress has authorized the president to suspend the operation of a statute .
sentences.chinese: 教务会议已经通过了一项记分制度章程。

sentences.english: The first chapel was conducted by the president, and the dean.
sentences.chinese: 第一个礼拜式是由校长和教务主任主持的。

sentences.english: This Code of Practice and its revisions will be implemented after being passed at the Academic Affairs Meeting.
sentences.chinese: 本细则经教务会议通过后实施，修正时亦同。

sentences.english: Students' academic results are officially recorded in the Academic Registry at the conclusion of each semester.
sentences.chinese: 每学期结束时，教务处将学生的学习成绩存档记录。

sentences.english: If you require further information, you should consult the registrar.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要进一步了解信息，请咨询教务主任。

sentences.english: Stuents wil be notified of their application status by first week of new term.
sentences.chinese: 教务处在开学第一周会通知学生重修申请是否批准。

sentences.english: Please submit this application form to the graduate studies office.
sentences.chinese: 将申请书缴回研究生教务组。

sentences.english: Timetabling is one of the most difficult subsystems in universities teaching administration system.
sentences.chinese: 高校排课系统是高校教务管理系统的重要组成部分。

definition: to give classes/to work as a teacher
school official responsible for supervising the students (old)
general matters/division of general affairs/person in overall charge
teacher in charge of a class
internal affairs/domestic affairs/family affairs/(trad.) affairs within the palace
